notes.title: API Integration Tasks
notes.description: Integrate the News API endpoints into the application, handle loading and error states properly, and refactor API calls into a reusable service layer.

notes.title: UI Improvements
notes.description: Improve spacing, typography, and card layout. Add hover effects to news cards and ensure category chips wrap correctly on smaller screens.

notes.title: Weekly Goals
notes.description: Set clear weekly goals, break them into smaller tasks, and review progress every Sunday to stay focused and avoid burnout.

notes.title: React Component Refactor
notes.description: Refactor old React class components into functional components with hooks.

notes.title: Database Optimization
notes.description: Analyze slow queries and create indexes to optimize database performance.

notes.title: Landing Page Redesign
notes.description: Sketch new landing page designs and prepare assets for implementation.

notes.title: Unit Test Coverage
notes.description: Add unit tests to increase code coverage above 80%.

notes.title: Daily Standup Notes
notes.description: Document key points from daily standup meetings for team reference.

notes.title: Auth API Update
notes.description: Add JWT authentication and refresh token support to backend API.

notes.title: Mobile Navigation Flow
notes.description: Design and test improved navigation flow for mobile users.

notes.title: Responsive Header
notes.description: Make the header responsive for all screen sizes using CSS Grid and Flexbox.

notes.title: Read React Docs
notes.description: Spend 1 hour reading React documentation on hooks and context API.

notes.title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
notes.description: Configure GitHub Actions for automatic deployment to staging server.

notes.title: Dark Mode Concept
notes.description: Create a dark mode mockup for the dashboard UI.

notes.title: Data Migration Script
notes.description: Write scripts to migrate old data to the new database schema.

notes.title: Plan Weekly Schedule
notes.description: Create a schedule for the upcoming week with priorities and tasks.

notes.title: Integration Tests
notes.description: Write integration tests for user registration and login flows.

notes.title: Prototype Dashboard
notes.description: Create clickable prototype for dashboard redesign.

notes.title: Optimize Bundle Size
notes.description: Analyze webpack bundle and remove unused dependencies to improve performance.

notes.title: Learn TypeScript
notes.description: Complete TypeScript tutorial and implement sample components in TS.

notes.title: Rate Limiting
notes.description: Implement rate limiting on API endpoints to prevent abuse.

notes.title: New Icon Set
notes.description: Design new icon set for UI components and toolbar.

notes.title: Form Validation
notes.description: Add client-side form validation with real-time error messages.

notes.title: Morning Routine
notes.description: Document and improve morning routine for better focus.

notes.title: API Logging
notes.description: Add logging middleware to track API requests and responses.

notes.title: Feedback Form
notes.description: Design a feedback form to collect user suggestions and issues.

notes.title: Dockerize Application
notes.description: Create Dockerfile and docker-compose setup for local development.

notes.title: Study GraphQL
notes.description: Learn GraphQL basics and implement sample queries.

notes.title: Accessibility Audit
notes.description: Audit web app for accessibility issues and fix them.

notes.title: Button Variants
notes.description: Create and document new button variants for design system.

notes.title: Optimize Queries
notes.description: Review SQL queries and optimize slow database calls.

notes.title: Weekly Review
notes.description: Reflect on accomplishments and plan for the next week.

notes.title: End-to-End Tests
notes.description: Write Cypress tests for critical user flows.
